Html:
Hello,

 

I have another problem. After update to v1.6 the following codesnippet freezes at ImageCacheSecond:

 

Dim ch As New GMap.NET.CacheProviders.MsSQLPureImageCache
 ch.ConnectionString = "Data Source=SQL_Server;Initial Catalog=dbStat;Integrated Security=True"
gMapC.Manager.ImageCacheSecond = ch

 

Is this a bug or did I something wrong?

Hello,

 

I have updated to the Hot Build Version to have the function "SecondaryCache" and I tried the same:

 

Dim ch As New GMap.NET.CacheProviders.MsSQLPureImageCache
 ch.ConnectionString = "Data Source=SQL_Server;Initial Catalog=dbStat;Integrated Security=True"
gMapC.Manager.SecondaryCache = ch

 

SecondaryCache didn't freeze like ImageCacheSecond in v1.6 but this function needs approximately 3 minutes. In the old version it was a matter of milliseconds.
i doubt that, nothing is changed in cache providers

Hello,

 

dunno whats happend, but now everything is like it was before. Maybe a lag at my sql_server.

 

Thanks for your Support!
